gemini-3-pro.title: 시그마의 성질을 이용한 식 정리
gemini-3-pro.body:
계산의 편의를 위해 $\sum_{k=1}^{10} a_k = A$, $\sum_{k=1}^{10} b_k = B$라고 둡니다.
시그마의 선형성($\sum (pa_k + q) = p\sum a_k + \sum q$)을 이용하여 주어진 두 조건을 $A$와 $B$에 대한 식으로 정리합니다.

1. 첫 번째 조건:
   $$\sum_{k=1}^{10} a_k = \sum_{k=1}^{10} (2b_k - 1)$$
   $$A = 2\sum_{k=1}^{10} b_k - \sum_{k=1}^{10} 1$$
   $$A = 2B - 10 \quad \cdots \text{①}$$
   (여기서 $\sum_{k=1}^{10} 1 = 10 \times 1 = 10$임에 유의합니다.)

2. 두 번째 조건:
   $$\sum_{k=1}^{10} (3a_k + b_k) = 33$$
   $$3\sum_{k=1}^{10} a_k + \sum_{k=1}^{10} b_k = 33$$
   $$3A + B = 33 \quad \cdots \text{②}$$

gemini-3-pro.title: 연립방정식을 통한 값 계산
gemini-3-pro.body:
구해진 두 식 ①과 ②를 연립하여 $B$의 값을 구합니다.

식 ①($A = 2B - 10$)을 식 ②에 대입합니다.
$$3(2B - 10) + B = 33$$
$$6B - 30 + B = 33$$
$$7B = 63$$
$$B = 9$$

문제에서 구하고자 하는 값은 $\sum_{k=1}^{10} b_k$, 즉 $B$이므로 정답은 9입니다.

gpt-5-codex.title: Represent sums
gpt-5-codex.body: Let A = sum_{k=1}^{10} a_k and B = sum_{k=1}^{10} b_k. From the given relation sum a_k = sum (2b_k - 1), obtain A = 2B - 10.

gpt-5-codex.title: Use second relation
gpt-5-codex.body: Use the second given relation sum (3a_k + b_k) = 33 to form 3A + B = 33. Substitute A = 2B - 10 to get 3(2B - 10) + B = 33.

gpt-5-codex.title: Solve for B
gpt-5-codex.body: Simplify 3(2B - 10) + B = 33 to obtain 6B - 30 + B = 33. Hence 7B = 63, giving B = 9.

gpt-5.title: Translate to sum variables
gpt-5.body: Let S_a = ∑_{k=1}^{10} a_k and S_b = ∑_{k=1}^{10} b_k. From ∑ a_k = ∑ (2b_k - 1), we get S_a = 2S_b - 10. From ∑ (3a_k + b_k) = 33, we get 3S_a + S_b = 33.

gpt-5.title: Solve for S_b
gpt-5.body: Substitute S_a = 2S_b - 10 into 3S_a + S_b = 33: 3(2S_b - 10) + S_b = 33 ⇒ 6S_b - 30 + S_b = 33 ⇒ 7S_b = 63 ⇒ S_b = 9.

grok-4-fast.title: Define sum notations
grok-4-fast.body: Let \( S_a = \sum_{k=1}^{10} a_k \) and \( S_b = \sum_{k=1}^{10} b_k \). The first equation simplifies to \( S_a = \sum_{k=1}^{10} (2b_k - 1) = 2S_b - 10 \).

grok-4-fast.title: Simplify second equation
grok-4-fast.body: The second equation is \( \sum_{k=1}^{10} (3a_k + b_k) = 3S_a + S_b = 33 \).

grok-4-fast.title: Substitute and solve
grok-4-fast.body: Substitute \( S_a = 2S_b - 10 \) into the second equation: \( 3(2S_b - 10) + S_b = 33 \), which simplifies to \( 6S_b - 30 + S_b = 33 \), so \( 7S_b = 63 \), and thus \( S_b = 9 \).
